thread.title: Tony Pulis took Jose Mourinho’s record against Arsene Wenger with West Brom win over Arsenal
thread.title_full: Tony Pulis took Jose Mourinho’s record against Arsene Wenger with West Brom win over Arsenal

author: Simon Rice
title: Tony Pulis took Jose Mourinho’s record against Arsene Wenger with West Brom win over Arsenal
text:
Jose Mourinho and Arsene Wenger have what could be described as a tetchy relationship (Getty) Jose Mourinho’s rivalry with Arsene Wenger is legendary, which is why the Manchester United boss will be upset at losing his win record over the Frenchman.
Over the years the Special One has dominated the Arsenal manager when they’ve met.
Luke Shaw returns to Man Utd squad as Jose Mourinho opts for three at the back But there’s one manager who’s now done an even better job – at least on his own turf.
West Brom manager Tony Pulis masterminded a 3-1 victory over the Gunners on Saturday that took his win percentage over Wenger at home to 63%. It includes his time in charge of Stoke City.
It eclipsed Mourinho’s own win percentage over Wenger at home.
63% – Tony Pulis now has a higher win % in home games vs Arsene Wenger than Jose Mourinho does against the Frenchman (all comps). Nemesis. pic.twitter.com/Byvq9b1ND8 
— OptaJoe (@OptaJoe) March 18, 2017 
More: Football Joe Hart at fault for both goals in shocking Torino performance 
When will Chelsea win the title as Conte eyes 21 points? 
Top official refuses to rule out Man Utd signing ‘next Thierry Henry’ 
With Wenger potentially calling time on his Arsenal career at the end of the season, Mourinho might not even get the chance to get the record back.
